means: 特殊情况( particular的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: The nurses at the admission desk asked her for particulars.
sentence.Network_cn: 住院接待处的护士询问了她的详细情况。

sentence.Network_en: You will find all the particulars in Chapter 9.
sentence.Network_cn: 你在第9章会找到所有细节。

sentence.Network_en: For further particulars I refer you to my secretary.

entry.def: The particulars of something or someone are facts or details about them which are written down and kept as a record.

example.ex: You will find all the particulars in Chapter 9...
example.tran: 你在第9章会找到所有细节。

example.ex: The nurses at the admission desk asked her for particulars.
example.tran: 住院接待处的护士询问了她的详细情况。
